plot outline: Kalidasa, a government school teacher, is a hard worker who is ridiculed due to his poor English skills. On the personal front, his upper-class wife is unhappy with his social status. When the school faces the threat of being shut down, Kalidasa takes it on himself to fight the education system.
title: Kalidasa Kannada Meshtru
